text: If I'd like to override customer_strategy_ref, is it just a matter of setting config.customer_strategy_ref before instantiating Flumine? I'd like to run multiple flumine instances on a single machine, and don't want instances becoming confused because of the same customer_strategy_ref they see in the order stream. (And I'd like to run multiple instances to use the multiple cores on the host in question)

elements.text: If I'd like to override customer_strategy_ref, is it just a matter of setting config.customer_strategy_ref before instantiating Flumine?
